divs: Sighting DetailsI saw an aircraft that was circular at the back end and sharp in the front end. Only saw for a few seconds. 30 seconds later saw 2 dark what seemed to be military jets, they were black and they were going very fast. Right behind them was the same color helicopter. They were going very fast and were very close to the top of the trees.
Summary: Saw strange object. 2 fighter jets 30 seconds after followed by a chopper. Just above tree tops
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Meridian Charter Township
There were no other sightings in Meridian Charter Township on or around August 11th 2012
